interface.name: org_kde_kwin_blur_manager
interface.description: This interface allows a client to request blur effect for a surface.

request.name: create

description.summary: create a blur object for a surface

request.description: Create a blur object for a surface.

request.name: unset
request.description: Remove blur effect from a surface.

interface.name: org_kde_kwin_blur
interface.description: This interface allows a client to specify a blur region for a surface.

request.name: commit
request.description: Apply all the previously configured state for this blur object.

request.name: set_region
request.description: Set the blur region. If region is null, the entire surface will be blurred.

request.name: release
request.description: Release the blur object, removing the blur effect from the surface.
